deleteProtectedItemsInFolder: Folder could not be deleted since some of the items are delete protected or have dependent items.

message.empty: Are you sure you want to delete the folder ${title}?
message.recycleAll: Are you sure you want to delete the folder ${title} and send its contents to the recycle bin?
message.mustBeEmpty: The folder ${title} must be emptied in order to be deleted.
message.aFewCannotBeDeleted: A few items cannot be deleted. Do you want to proceed with deleting the rest?
message.canBeEmptied: The folder ${title} must be emptied in order to be deleted. Do you want to proceed with deleting these items?
message.cannotBeDeleted: The folder ${title} cannot be deleted because its items cannot be deleted.

disabledMessage.single:
There is 1 item in this folder, ${label}.

Are you sure you want to delete this folder and its item?
disabledMessage.multiple:
There are ${number} items in this folder, ${label}.

Are you sure you want to delete this folder and all its items?
disabledMessage.unknown: Are you sure you want to delete this folder, ${label}?
